===Etymology===
[[Image:Pearl oyster.jpg|thumb|250px|The Japanese ''akoya'' pearl oyster.]]
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しんじゅがい|真珠|tr1=shinju|t1=pearl|貝|tr2=kai|t2=shell, shellfish}}. The ''kai'' changes to ''gai'' due to {{rendaku|しんじゅがい}}.
